amendment.description: To provide for domestic violence prevention.

action.text: Amendment SA 2859 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2859 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 62.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2859.
Amendment SA 2859 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S3151-3164) To provide for domestic violence prevention.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2859 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 62.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2859 proposed by Senator Murray.
